title: Fee Static File Schema
description: Schema for fee static file containing fee calculation static data

clearingMemberIdentificationId.description: Clearing member identifier provided by A5X

clearingMemberIdentificationCategory.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode

participantIdentificationId.description: Participant identifier provided by A5X during participant registration

participantIdentificationCategory.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode

accountIdentificationId.description: Account identifier defined by the participant

marketMakerIndicator.description: Indicates if the informed account belongs to a market maker

financialInstrumentIdentificationExchang.description: Exchange identifier code where the instrument was traded

market.description: Market type - second level of market classification in post-trade process
market.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalMarketCode

securityCategory.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalSecurityCategoryCode

quantity.description: Component quantity. Can be allocated quantity, exercised quantity or maturity settled quantity, according to indicated component

grossAmount.description: Total component amount. Can be total allocated amount, exercised amount or maturity settled amount, according to indicated component

spread.description: For option exercise: Difference between exercise price and market price. For maturity settlement: Difference between settlement price and adjustment price
spread.$comment: Field will be displayed when component deals with exercise or settlement

feeProductGroup.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalFeeProductGroupCode

feeComponent.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalFeeComponentCode

baseFeeValue.description: Base financial volume for fee calculation
baseFeeValue.$comment: Field will be filled to indicate cap/floor of product fee calculation

quantityFeeValue.$comment: Field will be filled to indicate cap/floor of product fee calculation

feeProductSubgroup.description: Represents the second level of fee family, when applicable
feeProductSubgroup.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalFeeProductGroupCode. Field will be filled when product uses second level of fee family

financialUnitCost.description: Unit cost value in financial terms

calculationType.description: Indicates if calculation is Progressive or Regressive
calculationType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCalcTypeCode. Field will not be filled when component deals with maturity settlement or exercise

additionalValueType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalFeeTypeIndicatorCode

additionalValue.$comment: Field will not be filled when component deals with maturity settlement or exercise
